com.intel.iasp.api.channels.fightclub

Class IASAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.iasp.api.channels.fightclub.IASAuthenticator

  • public final class IASAuthenticator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which performs a synchronous key exchange and challenge handshake with an IASP compliant device.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • IASAuthenticator

        public IASAuthenticator(@NonNull
                        android.content.Context context,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String applicationName,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String organizationName)
                 throws java.security.KeyStoreException
        Creates an instance of the IASAuthenticator.
        Parameters:
        context - the application context.
        applicationName - the application name that will be used in the self-signed certificate used for securing the key.
        organizationName - the organization name that will be used in the self-signed certificate used for securing the key.
        Throws:
        java.security.KeyStoreException - because the secure keystore could not be initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • isAuthenticationRequired

        public static boolean isAuthenticationRequired(@NonNull
                                               java.lang.String firmwareVersion)
        Determines if authentication is required for a given firmware version.
        Parameters:
        firmwareVersion - the firmware version string.
        Returns:
        whether authentication is required.

      • deleteDeviceAuthKey

        public void deleteDeviceAuthKey(@NonNull
                                android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
        Deletes a device key from the keystore if present. Needed if a device purges its key and attempts to connect to the app to prevent a key mismatch error during the connection.
        Parameters:
        device - the bluetooth device for which the auth key is deleted

      • authenticate

        @NonNull
public IASAuthenticator.AuthenticationResult authenticate(@NonNull
                                                                   android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device,
                                                                   @NonNull
                                                                   IASAPI iasapi)
        Synchronously negotiates a key exchange and challenge with an IASP compliant entity.
        Parameters:
        device - the bluetooth device that is being communicated with.
        iasapi - a live IASAPI instance use to communicate with the device.
        Returns:
        A IASAuthenticator.AuthenticationResult indicating the result of the authentication attempt.
